about_the_game:
Control a group of stranded survivors trying to stay afloat in a flooded world, where the only land is on unstable islands that can sink! Build up the perfect island colony, keep your survivors happy, and protect them from dangers on land and sea.

SURVIVE ON FLOATING ISLANDS

Island life is not all sunshine and coconuts. With sparse resources and limited island space, planning will be essential as you construct workstations, manage food production and secure drinkable water - all while making sure your island refuge stays above water.

Master Raft Crafting

Design and build your own raft! Start small with a simple paddle, then research large rafts with bigger engines that can haul islands to your home colony.


Stay Afloat, with Buoyancy Tech

Re-discover island buoyancy technology from a mysterious pre-flood corporation. Construct early warning systems and research Float-Tech contraptions to keep your islands afloat.


Go on Expeditions!

One tiny island won't be enough for long term survival... Send survivors on expeditions to collect resources from different biomes. Gather what you can before the islands sink or float away.


Keep Sea Spirits Up

Motivation is the key to survival! Keep a close eye on hunger, thirst, tiredness, comfort and other needs, or you'll find survivors slacking off, or leaving your group! Take advantage of each Oceaneer’s skills and traits to create an efficient island community.


Fend Off Threats Above and Below

Protect your colony from harsh weather, and threats on land and sea. Fortify your rafts, weather-proof your buildings and set up countermeasures against food-stealing seagulls, foot-pinching crabs and raft-wrecking sharks!


Uncover Deep Sea Secrets

Learn the truth of the sinking islands. Uncover hidden clues, find lost artifacts and discover tales from lost Oceaneers. But beware... some mysteries are best left underwater!

Features:

● Control multiple characters in this single player experience.
● Design multiple rafts and send survivors on expeditions.
● Haul islands back to your colony to expand your island home.
● Improve island buoyancy with contraptions that keep islands afloat.
● Research and unlock advanced workstations and upgrades.
● Survive against weather events, and threats on both land and sea.
● Farm crops, prepare rations and cook meals.
● Customize your survivor names, traits, hair styles... including beards & mustaches!
● Uncover the deep sea storyline plot alongside the survival journey.

name: Oceaneers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3-540 or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 or smilar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: KB & Mouse Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 960 or similar
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: KB & Mouse Recommended

short_description: A raft-crafting survival management colony sim set on sinkable islands. Manage survivors to scavenge, harvest and craft your way to an island colony! Build expedition rafts, research contraptions to keep islands afloat, and create your own floating colony. CRAFT, FLOAT, SURVIVE!
